definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="return_string"><value name="return"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="2"/><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">You can use this to store your hard earned rupees, although it's only big enough to hold 99!         </field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="3"/><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">           </field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text_format_number"><value name="number"><block type="item_nbt_num_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">RupeeCount</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"/></value></block></value><value name="format"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">##.##</field></block></value></block></value><value name="ADD2"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/99</field></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
